member.name: IPersistFile.GetCurFile
member.summary: Retrieves the current name of the file associated with the object. If there is no current working file, this method retrieves the default save prompt for the object.
member.param: The path for the current file or the default file name prompt (such as *.txt). If an error occurs, ppszFileName is set to NULL.

returns.para: This method can return the following values.

listheader.description: A valid absolute path was returned successfully.
The default save prompt was returned.
The operation failed due to insufficient memory.
The operation failed due to some reason other than insufficient memory.

member.name: IPersistFile.IsDirty
member.summary: Determines whether an object has changed since it was last saved to its current file.
member.returns: This method returns S_OK to indicate that the object has changed. Otherwise, it returns S_FALSE.

member.name: IPersistFile.Load
member.summary: Opens the specified file and initializes an object from the file contents.
member.param: The absolute path of the file to be opened.

The access mode to be used when opening the file. Possible values are taken from the STGM enumeration. The method can treat this value as a suggestion, adding more restrictive permissions if necessary. If dwMode is 0, the implementation should open the file using whatever default permissions are used when a user opens the file.

returns.para: This method can return the following values.

listheader.description: The object could not be loaded due to a lack of memory.
The object could not be loaded for some reason other than a lack of memory.

member.name: IPersistFile.Save
member.summary: Saves a copy of the object to the specified file.
member.param: The absolute path of the file to which the object should be saved. If pszFileName is NULL, the object should save its data to the current file, if there is one.

Indicates whether the pszFileName parameter is to be used as the current working file. If TRUE, pszFileName becomes the current file and the object should clear its dirty flag after the save. If FALSE, this save operation is a Save A Copy As ... operation. In this case, the current file is unchanged and the object should not clear its dirty flag. If pszFileName is NULL, the implementation should ignore the fRemember flag.
member.returns: If the object was successfully saved, the return value is S_OK. Otherwise, it is S_FALSE. This method can also return various storage errors.

member.name: IPersistFile.SaveCompleted
member.summary: Notifies the object that it can write to its file. It does this by notifying the object that it can revert from NoScribble mode (in which it must not write to its file), to Normal mode (in which it can). The component enters NoScribble mode when it receives an call.
member.param: The absolute path of the file where the object was saved previously.

member.name: IPersistFile
member.summary: Enables an object to be loaded from or saved to a disk file, rather than a storage object or stream. Because the information needed to open a file varies greatly from one application to another, the implementation of on the object must also open its disk file.
